occupation: Chief Operating Officer at ImageCare Radiology
headline: Healthcare operations executive with over 19 years of experience in managing and optimizing radiology facilities, driving organizational growth on an exceptional level, and mastering all aspects related to patient care.
summary:
With over a decade of experience in healthcare operations and administration, I've developed a deep expertise in optimizing workflows, enhancing patient satisfaction, and leading teams in fast-paced environments. My career has propelled me from front office roles where I orchestrated patient flow and secured expedited authorizations, to senior leadership positions where I expanded operational standards and produce top-tier service delivery satisfaction across multiple imaging centers.

Throughout my career, I've had the privilege of:

-Leading the expansion and daily operations of 23 imaging centers as Chief Operating Officer, where I developed and implemented staffing models, automated scheduling, and implemented effective savings initiatives, kickstarting significant improvements in efficiency and overall patient care.

-Spearheading the launch of three new imaging centers as Office Administrator, from overseeing facility setup to securing licensure, contributing to increased patient intake and operational success.


-Streamlining case processes at Denville Diagnostics Imaging, in which I initiated clear communication standards for urgent cases, allow for the quickest possible care and response time for critical patients.


I’m passionate about driving  excellence in healthcare and ensuring that both patients and staff have the best possible experience. I'm excited to collaborate with fellow professionals in the healthcare industry or those looking to collaborate with someone who has a proven track record in healthcare administration, operations management, and team leadership.

experiences.title: Chief Operating Officer
experiences.description:
Chief Operating Officer	As Chief Operating Officer, I led the expansion and operational excellence of 23 imaging centers, where I oversee all operations to ensure consistently productive output. My focus on operational efficiency involved optimizing use of automated scheduling systems, renegotiating vendor contracts, and ensuring regulatory compliance was a top priority. Employee satisfaction and retention were also key areas of focus; I implemented a new scheduling system that improved patient flow and satisfaction while addressing peak-time staffing needs through a weekend bonus program. This time in my career is defined by a commitment to operational improvement, strategic growth, and enhancing both employee and patient experiences.
Achievements:
1.	Increased revenue by over 30% through the successful launch of 20+ new imaging centers.
2.	Reduced patient wait times by 22% through enhanced training, and systematic scheduling.

experiences.title: Office Administrator
experiences.description:
Office Administrator- In my role as Office Administrator, I ensured seamless operations of three imaging facilities, contributing to a significant improvement in overall productivity. I was instrumental in the successful launch of three new imaging centers, boosted physician referrals and strengthened our relationships with local healthcare providers. Strict compliance adherence was crucial, and I continually ensured full compliance with state and federal regulations. I was able to enhance operational efficiency and streamline administrative tasks, ultimately improving the overall functionality of our facilities.
Achievements:
1.  Boosted physician referrals by 20% through community engagement, marketing, and referral strategies.
2. Redesigned workflows, implemented new systems and processes to achieve a 15% increase in operational efficiency.

experiences.title: Front Office Specialist
experiences.description:
• Directed patient flow by managing scheduling and pre-appointment preparations, reducing wait times by 20% and enhancing patient NPS scores by 25% points on average.
• Secured rapid prior authorizations for testing by liaising with several major insurance companies, decreasing delays in patient care and saving in out of network costs for patients. 
•	Facilitated patient readiness for exams by providing clear instructions and support, employing empathetic listening to improve the patient experience and resulting compliance with procedures.
• Streamlined communication with referring physicians regarding urgent cases by nurturing strong relationships, improving response times for critical patient needs.
